artist: Nicolas Africano; Publisher: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The Driscoll Arts Accession Fund
inscription: Printed inscription, UC: SALVADOR / spitting jewels, / in his armor / of grease, / his trousers stiff with fat / like a gypsy thief, / the hero / was lovingly drawn.
markings:
LL: [Archive Proof]
LL: VEL chop mark
provenance: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minnepaolis (publisher); sold to MIA, 1993.
signed: Signed and dated in pencil, LR: Nicolas / Africano 1992
title: Salvador
